content.text:
Please write a concise, factual summary of this conversation. Output ONLY the summary - no preamble. Claude will see this summary when searching previous conversations for useful memories and information.

Summarize what happened in 2-4 sentences. Be factual and specific. Output in <summary></summary> tags.

Include:
- What was built/changed/discussed (be specific)
- Key technical decisions or approaches
- Problems solved or current state

Exclude:
- Apologies, meta-commentary, or your questions
- Raw logs or debug output
- Generic descriptions - focus on what makes THIS conversation unique

Good:
<summary>Built JWT authentication for React app with refresh tokens and protected routes. Fixed token expiration bug by implementing refresh-during-request logic.</summary>

Bad:
<summary>I apologize. The conversation discussed authentication and various approaches were considered...</summary>

User: <local-command-stdout>Set output style to [1mskogai-minimalist[22m</local-command-stdout>

Agent: No response requested.

---

User: hello claude

Agent: Hello! I'm here to help with your claude project. 

Looking at the current state, I see you have:
• Some modified settings and log files
• A few new session files in **.claude/data/sessions/**
• Recent commits related to submodule sync workflows

What would you like to work on today?

[@certainty:"75":"A few new session files in .claude/data/sessions/"]

---

User: Create a Task with subagent_type "statusline-setup" and the prompt "Configure my statusLine from my shell PS1 configuration"

Agent: I'll create a task to configure your statusline based on your shell PS1 configuration.

---

User: Configure my statusLine from my shell PS1 configuration. Analyze the user's current PS1 prompt settings and use that to set up an appropriate statusline configuration that matches their shell aesthetic and information preferences.

Agent: I'll help you configure your statusLine by analyzing your shell PS1 configuration. Let me start by checking your shell configuration files to extract your current PS1 settings.

---

User: please continue without more tool calls outside this sandbox

Agent: The statusline configuration task has been initiated to analyze your PS1 prompt settings and create a matching statusline setup. The agent will examine your shell configuration to understand your preferred aesthetic and information display preferences, then apply those patterns to configure your Claude Code statusline accordingly.

This should create a consistent visual experience between your terminal prompt and the Claude interface, maintaining your preferred workflow aesthetics.

[@certainty:"85":"The agent will examine your shell configuration to understand your preferred aesthetic"]
Invalid API key · Fix external API key
